definition: A raised surface or structure that serves as a stage, base, or support for various activities, often used for public speaking, performances, or as a launching point for transportation. It is commonly utilized in the context of technology, specifically referring to a digital space or website where users can interact, share information, or conduct business.

examples.german: Die Plattform bietet eine Vielzahl von Diensten an.
examples.english: The platform offers a variety of services.

examples.german: Die Plattform ermöglicht den Austausch von Informationen.
examples.english: The platform enables the exchange of information.

examples.german: Auf der Plattform können Benutzer miteinander kommunizieren.
examples.english: On the platform, users can communicate with each other.

examples.german: Die Plattform dient als zentrale Anlaufstelle für Kunden.
examples.english: The platform serves as a central point of contact for customers.

examples.german: Die Plattform bietet eine benutzerfreundliche Oberfläche.
examples.english: The platform offers a user-friendly interface.
